problem_text_cn: 如图,为了测量池塘的宽DE,在岸边找到点C,测得CD=30m,在DC的延长线上找一点A,测得AC=5m,过点A作AB∥DE交EC的延长线于B,测出AB=6m,则池塘的宽DE为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the width of the pond DE, find point C on the bank, measure CD = N_0, find a point A on the extension line of DC, measure AC = N_1, and pass point A as the extension of AB ∥ DE and EC The line is at B, and AB = N_2 is measured, then the width of the pond DE is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的应用:利用影长测量物体的高度；利用相似测量河的宽度(测量距离)；借助标杆或直尺测量物体的高度．
